Description.Text: Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten is a traditional 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Kaprun. Highlights include a sauna area, an indoor swimming pool, a restaurant, a lounge bar and an excellent location next to the ski bus stop. Karpun is a small alpine village situated at the foot of the Kitzsteinhorn Glacier. It offers breathtaking scenery and all-year skiing. It is also home to the 12th-century Kaprun Castle, one of the oldest of its kind in the providence. Bus stops are in the vicinity, providing easy access to the ski slopes. The hotel occupies a traditional mid-rise building with a white facade and Austrian spruce-wood balconies. Facilities include three saunas, a steam room and an indoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are comfortable and tastefully decorated. They boast a balcony with a sitting area. Amenities include a flat-screen cable TV, a radio, a telephone and a safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower. The hotel restaurant serves healthy regional delicacies. There is also a cosy lounge bar with a fireplace and piano. Free parking is possible onsite.
